Never stay in bagalkot. All 9 hotels are charging same tariff Rs.2300 per day 12 noon strict checkout. No sight seeing places. No entertainment. Rooms are average lodge rooms. Horrible breakfast and not that good taste.

Worst hotel I have seen in my whole career I told the staff at 6 pm that my room tv is not working but they have not solved the problem yet so the entire hotel staffs are not good they have not given any service they are morning tv will get on like that there is no proper communication they have given to the customers this is the worst hotel I have seen in Bagalkot

places_with_reviews.name: Kailash Inn
address: near Rotary Circle, opposite Kerudi Cancer Hospital, Bagalkote, Karnataka 587101, India

reviews.text: I had a disappointing experience at this hotel, which claimed to offer luxury but fell short. Upon booking an AC room for my family, we encountered numerous issues. The AC in the room was not functioning, despite multiple attempts to fix it. The staff was uncooperative and dismissive of our complaints. It took multiple room changes and over an hour to finally get a room with a working AC, leaving my family, especially my young child, uncomfortable in the hot weather. It's evident they prioritize profit over guest comfort, and their attitude towards complaints is unacceptable. Overall, a frustrating experience that tarnished our stay. Avoid this hotel if you value your peace of mind and comfort.

1. Don’t book via travel apps as they reject upon arrival
2. Exuberantly charging for services like 20₹ water bottle for 30₹ n if you question about it , the owner gives blatant reason of paying hidden taxes to local authorities and humbleness is completely missing
3. Food s very ordinary.
4. Overall a overrated hotel

Worst service. Rooms are not clean, restaurant service and quality is not OK.
Needs much more improvement. Dear Customers do not look into the ambience and photos. Actual stay differs a lot here. Do not get yourself cheated. Even complementary breakfast  options are also less. You will become fool if you book hotel

We stayed at Kailash Inn for 4 days in Dec 23/Jan 24. We had booked a suite and a deluxe room. The rooms are ok, need some improvement.The staff of the hotel is very helpful and cooperated in every way to make our stay comfortable. Special mention to Ms.Kaushalya, who took a lot of care at the restaurant giving us the best service. Ms. Ankita of the reception went out of her way to help our senior citizen member and giving us prompt service where ever required. Both these young girls genuinely care for their guests. The food at the restaurant is good. The complimentary breakfast had limited options but was fresh and good. This hotel gives the best service and made our stay very pleasant and comfortable. Thank you guys. We will definitely visit again.

One of the unsafe hotel in Bagalkot for corporates and business executes.

One of the worst experience from uncultured staffs and highly rude behavior by owner/MD Mr. Abhishek for the regular corporate customer at nights for rooms and sudden high price on demand.
Almost wasted my 2 hours of time by saying they will give rooms during night. And finally got rooms with lots of arguments and insults. helpless situations
Terrible.. No lights in corridors at nights in any floor. staffs drops for room in mobile torch light.
WiFi not works at all, Hot water problem in all the rooms, Cleanliness is just moderate.
Think twice before booking the rooms

places_with_reviews.name: Chalukya Hotel
address: Sector 4, Sector 63A, Nava Nagar, Bagalkote, Karnataka 587103, India

reviews.text: Nice and well maintained lodge. Owner himself alongwith his take care. Nice hospitality. Lodge situated in good location.

Not clean, receptionist was unresponsive.
No drinking water and towels in room. Avoid if possible.
Clean and budget friendly Rooms to stay... Friendly staffs, and location is also good

Improvements needed:
1. Some rooms do not have windows or any kind of ventilation. Please ask for ventilated rooms (corner rooms)
2. Bathrooms are not clean. Some are western (comode) and some are Indian style.
3. There are no AC rooms. All the rooms are non AC.
4. Bedsheets, blankets and pillow are not washed regularly.

Good points:
1. Hot and cold water is available.
2. Price is affordable
3. Have some space for parking.
4. Few rooms are good.

Location is good, but cleanliness and service is worst.
Not preferable to stay with family, and even not preferable for girls and couples.
In picture the room looks good but actually its not.

places_with_reviews.name: Hotel Shiva Sangam Residency
address: Badami Rd, APMC Yard, Nava Nagar, Bagalkote, Karnataka 587103, India

reviews.text:
It's near a few wedding halls. That's the only reason to stay here.
Few photo props are there and the hotel looks like it is a ruined dhaba.
Rooms were pathetic and way too costly. Old, spacious but untidy rooms maintained poorly with water leaking in the balcony. Washrooms were having spots and beds and bedsheets looked like they were never cleaned. No lift.
Rude manager, not providing any service.
It is a bit inside away from the main road and the approach road is full of gravel and coarse. It's like a mini trekking reaching the hotel. No other shops or nothing is nearby.
The approach road is pitch dark and unsafe in the nights. (Attached pictures).
Overall, spacious but not well maintained hotel.

Ideally this hotel doesn't deserve any ratings, most irresponsible front office team & service team, they charged for 4 people n 2 pillows provided, asked for 2 extra beds but given 1, when asked they simply say there is a shortage,bedsheets were torned, today morning i asked for towels receiptionsist said will send in 10 mins but for 2 hrs no one turned out, morning 7 am there was no hot water, i went down & enquired at reception then he went and started,after 10 reminders they had give 1 towel in 4 people, no soap, water bottles, phones r not available in the rooms, street dogs & cats are the permanent members of this hotel. TV remote i asked for 2-4 times, then I went to reception & collected,but could not able to on the TV. I stay in many good hotels of these range from last 3 decades but have never experienced such a worst service and on such a poor service there is no regulation, big zero for value for money. I will never stay in such unprofessional dirty hotel.

This hotel is an old hotel, no towels were provided. No service to rooms. There is a temple beside hotel and they play songs so loud in the early morning that nobody can sleep. No water bottle provided. No phone to call reception. In total there's no service at all. Irresponsible people. Nobody will come back if they have been here once. Atleast am not coming back. That's all

Worst stay on my entire karnataka trip, never seen such worst hotel. Owner is such a pathetic, have instructed receptionist to give only one water bottle even if they stay more than 3days. So ideally I should check in and check out daily to get water bottle or else I’m not eligible 😂 this place is joke for hospitality business.

Rooms not clean, foot mats are very dirty. Not maintained well. Has no lift, need to climb stairs, I don't mind once or twice to climb stairs, not all the time.
Rooms are spacious though, but of no use if it is dirty

places_with_reviews.name: Sarvodaya Deluxe Lodge
address: opposite Bus stand, Ward No 10, Bagalkote, Karnataka 587101, India

reviews.text: This is just opposite to Buss stand. It has both hotel and lodging. Hot water is available on demand for taking bath. The place is very average in terms of its cleanliness.  However they change the bedsheets every day morning but if they miss you to inform them and then they will change it quickly. They also provide clean towels. I have given 3 stars because their cleaning of floors is not good and you can feel dirt while walking in the room. Other than this it is ok lodging. The taste in the hotel also average.
Conveniently located near Bagalkot old bus stand and 1 k.m. away from railway station.  Rooms not maintained properly.  As a last option once can stay here.

Opposite to the old bus stand. The place is better than i expected. Ideal for bachelors visiting Bagalkot or Badami. The room was clean and the bed was nice and comfortable. The washroom is very clean too. They have TV as well. Affordable rates. Overall happy with it. They have an attachment restaurant too which serves good food.

I guess there are two parts of this hotel. One side the old one and other side the newly expanded ones

The room we got was newly built it was neat and clean. Doesn’t look good from the outside but when we checked the room it was really nice and price is much cheaper 800rs per day.
Bed sheets were dirty which upon request they replaced immediately.
Located right infront of the bus stand and ten minute walk to railway station.

Geyser is fitted inside the room where the hot water is available 24x7 but the other part of the hotel which I guess is the old one , hot water will be provided outside the room which has to be collected and carried to the room
Stayed for three days. Worst experience. Unclean, ill maintained.

Worst room ever, lethargic, highly unhygienic, dirty and diseased rooms ,

In room 121 , There were too many bed bugs and cockroaches on bed !!!!😨😨😨
So they gave us room 117 ( ac) ,
The ac doesn't work, the toilets are worse
Even graveyards and sewage are more clean than this hotel

They have gods photo hanging on walls but inside the room , the gods would die ..

Sleep with your family on footpath but not in this hotel
Rooms are just ok for a a short stay of a day or two.

Food very testy and cleenness.
Good service , good parking.

A decent hotel. Nothing great. Decent rooms. There were some flies in the room. Not so tidy. The architecture is old. Water dripping from pipes. It is a good place to stay for a cheap rate. (Rs 650/- for a non A/C deluxe room). There is an old tv in the room. The bed sheets were not so tidy but good for the price. It is a decent hotel in bagalkot considering the price.
Owner nice but staff persons could not care about visitors
